commit.message:
fold-const.c (fold_comparison): Fold comparisons like (x * 1000 < 0) to (x < 0).

./:	* fold-const.c (fold_comparison): Fold comparisons like (x *
	1000 < 0) to (x < 0).
testsuite/:
	* gcc.dg/fold-compare-2.c: New test case for fold_comparison.

From-SVN: r120649
